document_data.name: Lamp of Devotion
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lamp of Devotion''' was a sacred flame for the [[holy slayer]]s of the [[Everlasting]] within the fortress of [[Sarahin]].{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|25-26}}
document_data.History: Located within the [[Tower of the Dawn]], the flame was tended so it burned brightly during all hours of the day, signifying the Everlasting's honor of [[Hajama]].
